Uses of Class
brave.propagation.SamplingFlags

Packages that use SamplingFlags 
Package Description
brave.propagation  
brave.sampler  

  • Uses of SamplingFlags in brave.propagation

    Subclasses of SamplingFlags in brave.propagation 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  TraceContext
    Contains trace identifiers and sampling data propagated in and out-of-process.
    class  TraceIdContext
    Contains inbound trace ID and sampling flags, used when users control the root trace ID, but not the span ID (ex Amazon X-Ray or other correlation).
    Fields in brave.propagation declared as SamplingFlags 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static SamplingFlags SamplingFlags.DEBUG  
    static SamplingFlags SamplingFlags.EMPTY  
    static SamplingFlags SamplingFlags.NOT_SAMPLED  
    static SamplingFlags SamplingFlags.SAMPLED  
    Methods in brave.propagation that return SamplingFlags 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    SamplingFlags SamplingFlags.Builder.build()
    Deprecated.
     
    static SamplingFlags SamplingFlags.Builder.build​(Boolean sampled)
    Deprecated.
    Allows you to create flags from a boolean value without allocating a builder instance
    SamplingFlags TraceContextOrSamplingFlags.samplingFlags()
    Returns non-null when a trace ID was not extracted from a request.
    Methods in brave.propagation with parameters of type SamplingFlags 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static TraceContextOrSamplingFlags TraceContextOrSamplingFlags.create​(SamplingFlags flags)
    Used to implement TraceContext.Extractor.extract(Object) when the format allows extracting only sampling flags.
    static TraceContextOrSamplingFlags.Builder TraceContextOrSamplingFlags.newBuilder​(SamplingFlags flags)
    Use when implementing TraceContext.Extractor.extract(Object) requires TraceContextOrSamplingFlags.Builder.sampledLocal() or TraceContextOrSamplingFlags.Builder.addExtra(Object).
    TraceContextOrSamplingFlags.Builder TraceContextOrSamplingFlags.Builder.samplingFlags​(SamplingFlags samplingFlags)
    Deprecated.
    Since 5.12, use TraceContextOrSamplingFlags.newBuilder(SamplingFlags)

  • Uses of SamplingFlags in brave.sampler

    Deprecated.
    Since 5.8, use DeclarativeSampler.trySample(Object)
    SamplingFlags ParameterizedSampler.sample​(P parameters)
    Deprecated.
    Since 5.8, use ParameterizedSampler.trySample(Object)
